message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to your business.  While I can't disclose specifics without an NDA, I assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm offering it to you for a very competitive price of $1800000.  This is a limited-time offer, as another buyer is interested.  Let's schedule a call to discuss the details further.  What do you think?
